timers.name: Fly the Falcon Mount Campaign
timers.info: During this time period, if a total of 90 days of subscription time are purchased, players will receive a Falcon mount.

timers.name: Stormblood Early Access
timers.info: Accounts without full Stormblood access will lose access to Stormblood exclusive features when the Early Access period ends.
timers.note: Note: End time was given as "Friday, June 23, 2017 at 11:59 p.m. (Per Region)" and is currently set based on PDT. It may be different in your region.
